_header: Jesu that suffered at the hour of prime of the day
_description: On the Hours of the Cross — ends incompletely

BLRoy2Bx.Transcription:
Ihesu that sufferyd at the owre of pryme of the dayethe Iewes dyd yow
                    grete derreybeffore pyllat the master of þe laweas a theffe yt
                    shulde have bene to draweand all was for owre gylte & owr trespas &
                    not ffor yoursye were Iput & ffor…
BLRoy2Bx.Note: Six irregular lines, incomplete. Written as prose.
BLRoy2Bx.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “Palden’s Middle English Prayer.” 
             Notes and Queries
         16th ser. 16 [196] (1951): 134.
